LanguageData.setting_timetoClose_desc: ACEN will close notifications if they have been active for more than the defined amount of in-game hours.
LanguageData.setting_showMessage_desc: A silent message will be displayed when removing old notifications.
LanguageData.setting_closeGood_desc: ACEN will automatically close positive (blue) event notifications.
LanguageData.setting_closeNonUrgent_desc: ACEN will automatically close negative (yellow) event notifications.
LanguageData.setting_closeUrgent_desc: ACEN will automatically close urgent (red) event notifications.
LanguageData.message_removed_good: Autoclose Event Notifications removed a positive (blue) notification.
LanguageData.message_removed_nonUrgent: Autoclose Event Notifications removed a negative (yellow) notification.
LanguageData.message_removed_urgent: Autoclose Event Notifications removed an urgent (red) notification.
